  • Projects, Services, Clients, Contact Form

Home Three

  • Creative Hamburger Menu
  • Creative, Fixed Background
  • Project Slider With Cool Animation

Home Split

  • Creative Hamburger Menu
  • Split Screen Layout
  • MultiScroll Project Showcase

Elementor Drag-n-Drop Visual Builder

Wavee is built upon Elementor, one of the most advanced, easy-to-use page builders inmodern days. Its intuitive, front end builder enables you to make necessary changes on your web-page and its preview panel gives you real-time view of what you are achieving. Pure fun!

One-click demo import. Load the demo you like with a single click.

The Theme Importer provides you with all pages and posts, sample sliders, widgets, theme options, assigned pages, and more.

Awesome Blogging

We have included beautiful and useful blog archive layouts - list, grid views. And blow single is also a gem. Moreover, you can show or hide the sidebars.

Creative & versatile portfolio

Adjust item spacing, use cool animations, customize hover effects, or even create custom portfolio layouts.

9+ Portfolio stunning layouts

Grid View

Fluid View

Grid View

Masonary View

Fluid View With Title

Mobile Optimized

Wavee is 100% responsive to make your website look beautiful in all devices and resolutions.

Get premium and exclusive plugins for free

Wavee Core

Required Plugin

Elementor Builder

Page Builder

ACF Pro

Premium Plugin - Save $25

Redux Framework

Free Plugin

MailChimp

Subscription Plugin

Contact Form 7

Free Plugin

Marvelous Header Styles

Wavee gives the flexibility to choose from a number of headers of different styles.

Check Now

Different Footers

Multi column layouts combined with subfoooter and footer top content with page builder.

Premade inner pages.

Save time with a single click ready-to-go beautiful pre-made inner pages and UI elements.

Countless key features

We given to you quick list of the main features, check the pages to see the features in action

State Of The Art Design

Wavee comes with beautifully deisgned pages that will make your website really attractive.

5+ Premade Demos

Choose among many ready-made solutions to get your business running in no time!

50+ Shortcodes Collection

Use our unique pre-made Visual Composer elements to make your site stand out.

800+ Google Fonts

Feature your web project by choosing from 800+ Google Fonts that suits it the most.

One Click Demo Importer

Wavee has a super easy way to import the demo with One Click Demo Importer and setup the theme in a moment.

Multi Footer Styles

Multi column layouts combined with subfoooter and footer top content with page builder.

Responsive & Retina Ready

Wavee is 100% responsive to make your website look beautiful in all devices and resolutions.

Parallax Scrolling

You can set parallax backgrounds to any page section in seconds.

Extensive Documentation

The documentation file covers all the Information needed to install and use this.

Speed Performance

The code is always optimized for best performance on all.

Friendly Support

Stuck? Need help? Visit our support portal to find FAQ and a way to contact us.

Auto Updates

Stay up-to-date with the latest version of our theme without needing to do it manually.

Make a website Youll be Proud of

Save hours on design and development and launch faster.

Buy Wavee Now

item.title: One-Page
item.dc:creator: arif
item.content:encoded:
Full Screen Portfolio Theme for Agencies, Freelancers & Professionals.

  • 4+

    home pages

  • 8+

    portfolio

  • 50+

    elements

  • 19+

    total pages

Stunning Demos

Demo websites. Single click install.

Choose from pre-made layouts for Creative Portfolio

Home One

  • Creative Hamburger Menu
  • Multi-color Scrolling Slides
  • Creative Project Showcase

Home Two

  • Classic Menu With Dropdown
  • Multi-color Scrolling Slides
  • Projects, Services, Clients, Contact Form

Home Three

  • Creative Hamburger Menu
  • Creative, Fixed Background
  • Project Slider With Cool Animation

Home Split

  • Creative Hamburger Menu
  • Split Screen Layout
  • MultiScroll Project Showcase

Elementor Drag-n-Drop Visual Builder

Wavee is built upon Elementor, one of the most advanced, easy-to-use page builders inmodern days. Its intuitive, front end builder enables you to make necessary changes on your web-page and its preview panel gives you real-time view of what you are achieving. Pure fun!

One-click demo import. Load the demo you like with a single click.

The Theme Importer provides you with all pages and posts, sample sliders, widgets, theme options, assigned pages, and more.

Awesome Blogging

We have included beautiful and useful blog archive layouts - list, grid views. And blow single is also a gem. Moreover, you can show or hide the sidebars.

Creative & versatile portfolio

Adjust item spacing, use cool animations, customize hover effects, or even create custom portfolio layouts.

9+ Portfolio stunning layouts

Grid View

Fluid View

Grid View

Masonary View

Fluid View With Title

Mobile Optimized

Wavee is 100% responsive to make your website look beautiful in all devices and resolutions.

Get premium and exclusive plugins for free

Wavee Core

Required Plugin

Elementor Builder

Page Builder

ACF Pro

Premium Plugin - Save $25

Redux Framework

Free Plugin

MailChimp

Subscription Plugin

Contact Form 7

Free Plugin

Marvelous Header Styles

Wavee gives the flexibility to choose from a number of headers of different styles.

Check Now

Different Footers

Multi column layouts combined with subfoooter and footer top content with page builder.

Premade inner pages.

Save time with a single click ready-to-go beautiful pre-made inner pages and UI elements.

Countless key features

We given to you quick list of the main features, check the pages to see the features in action

State Of The Art Design

Wavee comes with beautifully deisgned pages that will make your website really attractive.

5+ Premade Demos

Choose among many ready-made solutions to get your business running in no time!

50+ Shortcodes Collection

Use our unique pre-made Visual Composer elements to make your site stand out.

800+ Google Fonts

Feature your web project by choosing from 800+ Google Fonts that suits it the most.

One Click Demo Importer

Wavee has a super easy way to import the demo with One Click Demo Importer and setup the theme in a moment.

Multi Footer Styles

Multi column layouts combined with subfoooter and footer top content with page builder.

Responsive & Retina Ready

Wavee is 100% responsive to make your website look beautiful in all devices and resolutions.

Parallax Scrolling

You can set parallax backgrounds to any page section in seconds.

Extensive Documentation

The documentation file covers all the Information needed to install and use this.

Speed Performance

The code is always optimized for best performance on all.

Friendly Support

Stuck? Need help? Visit our support portal to find FAQ and a way to contact us.

Auto Updates

Stay up-to-date with the latest version of our theme without needing to do it manually.

Make a website Youll be Proud of

Save hours on design and development and launch faster.

Buy Wavee Now
